section.p: DITA Open Toolkit is an implementation of the OASIS DITA Technical Committee's specification for DITA DTDs and schemas. The Toolkit, which can be used in the Windows, Linux, and Mac OS operating environments, transforms DITA content (maps and topics) into deliverable formats.

DITA Open Toolkit supports the following publishing environments:
DocBook
Eclipse content
Eclipse help
HTML Help
JavaHelp
PDF
troff
Word RTF
XHTML
